motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of August 12, 2024 meeting minutes, backup and recovery services agreement, holiday lights contract award, and stormwater master model funding authorization.

motions.title: Text Amendment to Chapter 16 for Streetscape Design Standards (Second Read)
motions.description: Second read approval of text amendment to provide streetscape design standards for certain areas of the city (primarily Jett Ferry area).

motions.title: Contract Amendment for Happy Hollow Sidewalk Design
motions.description: Approval of contract amendment with Practical Design Partners for final design of Happy Hollow sidewalk from Kingsland Court to Peeler Road not to exceed $146,050.

motions.title: Contract Amendment for Mount Vernon Corridor Improvements
motions.description: Approval of contract amendment with NV5 for preliminary and final design of Mount Vernon Corridor improvements to total contract price of $137,170.

motions.title: EEOC Conciliation Agreement Approval
motions.description: Approval of EEOC Conciliation Agreement regarding No. 410-2021-00565.
